description:
Yuka Yoshii, the school`s idol who is good-looking, has excellent grades, and is good at sports... is actually a lewd schoolgirl who repeatedly has perverted desires and delusions.
Takashi, who follows her, is also a man of tremendous love! Yuka ends up in a certain situation with her stalker Takashi, and she kneels down on the ground and starts sucking his cock as he apologizes!
What happens after intense sex between the lewd virgin and the super-obsessed stalker...?
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: Yuuka Yoshii, une élève pas si modèle…
